item.title: Federal prosecutors dismiss Trump documents case in major presidential perk
item.description: The move amounts to a predictable but nonetheless stunning conclusion to a criminal case that just one year ago had been seen as the most perilous leg...

item.title: Hypertension is a ‘silent killer.’ Here’s what your blood pressure should be at every age
item.description: Over time, hypertension can lead to serious medical problems including stroke, heart attack, and kidney failure.

item.title: Dangerous ultra-processed foods are linked to more than 30 health conditions. Here’s how to identify and avoid them
item.description: Processing isn't inherently negative—the extent of processing and its impact on nutrient density are critical factors to consider.

item.title: This CEO fired 90% of his staff for missing a morning meeting. He stands by the choice
item.description: ‘Firing those individuals was the right move for our organization, and we are stronger than ever,’ the CEO later wrote on LinkedIn.

item.title: Tether was an outlaw for years. Now the $132 billion stablecoin has a key ally in Trump’s Cabinet
item.description: The controversial Tether is reportedly facing a probe from both the Justice and Treasury departments.
